sentences.en: According to the anatomy date, the airway was established with hydrodynamics software.
sentences.cn: 以实际人体解剖学数据为基础, 利用流体力学软件构建了口腔模型.

sentences.en: Airway smooth muscle is fundamental in maintain airway tone.
sentences.cn: 气道平滑肌是维持气道张力的根本.

sentences.en: Alcohol causes a relaxation of the airway during sleep.
sentences.cn: 酒精会引起气管壁松弛.

sentences.en: Breath holding was noted immediately after laryngeal mask airway ( LMA ) insertion .
sentences.cn: 在麻醉诱导,放置 喉头 面罩之后,病人马上发生闭气的现象.

sentences.en: Conclusion Lung dilated suction could increase the tidal volume decrease airway pressure.
sentences.cn: 结论用膨肺吸痰法吸痰能使病人潮气量增加,气道压力下降.

sentences.en: Conclusion mechanism of ping chuan mixture associated with depressing the airway inflammation.
sentences.cn: 结论平喘合剂治疗儿童哮喘的作用机制与抑制气道炎症等机制有关.

sentences.en: Exercise - induced bronchoconstriction ( EIB ) describes airway narrowing association with exercise.
sentences.cn: 运动诱发性支气管痉挛 ( exercise-inducedbronchoconstriction, EIB ) 是由运动诱发的急性短暂的气道缩窄.

sentences.en: How does a private pilot get access to the airways?
sentences.cn: 一个私人飞机的飞行员如何获得航线使用权呢？

sentences.en: In obstructie sleep apnea, the upper airway narrows, or collapses, during sleep.
sentences.cn: 在阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停中, 睡眠期间上呼吸道狭窄或踏陷.

sentences.en: Lay them on their side and ensure the airway is unobstructed.
sentences.cn: 让他们侧躺着,并确保呼吸道畅通.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the clinical effect of continual airway humidification aftertracheotomy.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨气管切开后持续气道湿化的临床效果.

sentences.en: Reactive airway disease is classified into extrinsic and intrinsic asthma.
sentences.cn: 反应性呼吸道疾病分为内源性和外源性哮喘.

sentences.en: Suspect complete airway obstruction if victim cannot speak, and has a weak cough.
sentences.cn: 如果患者不能说话, 并带有微弱咳嗽,就要考虑为完全的气道阻塞.

sentences.en: The reopening of obstructed pulmonary airway was simulated experimentally in this paper.
sentences.cn: 实验模拟了受阻塞肺下呼吸道重开的生物力学问题.

sentences.en: There is a purple airway in London Airport.
sentences.cn: 伦敦机场里有一条皇家专用飞机跑道.

sentences.en: They help control and prevent airway spasms during asthma attacks.
sentences.cn: 在哮喘发作时,它们可以帮助控制和阻止气道痉挛.

words.tran_cn: 导气管；空中航线；通风孔

trans.tran_cn: 航线，（矿井的）风道，（肺的）气道，通气道
trans.tran_en: the passage in your throat that you breathe through
